summary: In 1965, 13 y.o. paperboy Andy is paired up with a geek on a project in the popular junior high teacher's class. Andy learns and grows from it.
cast: Ed Harris|Chase Ellison|Molly Parker|Daniel Roebuck|Randy Orton|Daniel Yelsky|Alexander Walters|Mia Rose Frampton|Amy Madigan|Camille E. Bourgeois III|Renwick D. title: That's What I Am
